pageTitle: Cable car and ExCeL exclusive rate
description: We've teamed up with ExCeL to offer a discount on Emirates Air Line travel if you're going to an ExCeL event or exhibition

breadcrumbs.title: Cable car and ExCeL exclusive rate

title.title: Cable car and ExCeL exclusive rate

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["As a partner of ExCeL London, the Emirates Air Line now offers event visitors and exhibitors the opportunity to arrive in style for an exclusive £2.50 per journey rate (normal fare is £4.50)."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

Why not travel home or to your event with a unique flight on the Emirates Air Line. The cable car connects Royal Victoria (DLR) station and North Greenwich (Jubilee Line). Royal Victoria is just a short walk from ExCeL.

Journey times on the cable car are under 10 minutes. Visitors can access The O2 in North Greenwich easily for entertainment after the event day and choose from a selection of bars and restaurants, all while soaking up city skyline views.
Whether you are on your way to an event or finishing up the day, you can benefit from a discounted trip at just £2.50.
To redeem the discounted rate, show proof of attendance to an ExCeL event on the day (for example, a ticket, delegate pass or confirmation email showing the same day of travel).

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Cabins  arrive every 30 seconds and flights last approximately 10 minutes each way","Fully accessible for wheelchairs, bicycles and pushchairs with step-free access"]}
